Title: The Great Game
Writer: Mark Gatiss, Steven Moffat (created with), Arthur Conan Doyle (based on the works of)
Actors: Benedict Cumberbatch, Martin Freeman, Rupert Graves, Una Stubbs
Plot: Mycroft needs Sherlock's help, but a remorseless criminal mastermind puts Sherlock on a distracting crime-solving spree via a series of hostage human bombs through which he speaks.
